title: Geography of Singapore
description: Explore Singapores physical geography, climate, and land use
description_zh: 探索新加坡的自然地理、气候和土地利用
objectives_zh: 了解新加坡的位置和气候

sections.title: Location and Climate
sections.content: Singapore is located 1°N of the Equator. Tropical rainforest climate with temperatures 25-32°C year-round, high humidity (80-90%), and monsoon seasons.
sections.content_zh: 新加坡位于赤道以北1°。热带雨林气候，全年温度25-32°C，高湿度（80-90%），季风季节。

sections.title: Land Reclamation
sections.content: Singapore has grown from 581.5 km² (1960s) to over 730 km² (2023) through land reclamation. Major reclaimed areas include Marina Bay, Tuas, and Jurong Island.
sections.content_zh: 新加坡通过填海造地从581.5平方公里（1960年代）增长到超过730平方公里（2023年）。主要填海区域包括滨海湾、大士和裕廊岛。

sections.title: Water Resources
sections.content: Singapore has 4 National Taps: local catchment water, imported water from Malaysia, NEWater (recycled water), and desalinated water.
sections.content_zh: 新加坡有四大水喉：本地集水区水、从马来西亚进口的水、新生水（循环水）和海水淡化水。

exercises.question: How many National Taps does Singapore have?
exercises.question_zh: 新加坡有几个国家水喉？
exercises.explanation: Singapore has 4 National Taps for water supply
exercises.explanation_zh: 新加坡有4个国家水喉供应水源
